text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1943 Final was the 41st final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Estadio Metropolitano in Madrid, on 20 June 1943, being won by Club Atlético de Bilbao, who beat Real Madrid CF 1-0 after extra time. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|Club Atlético de Bilbao: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| Raimundo Lezama |- |DF ||2|| Juan José Mieza |- |DF ||3|| Isaac Oceja (c) |- |MF ||4|| Higinio Ortúzar |- |MF ||5|| Antonio Ortiz |- |MF ||6|| Nando |- |FW ||7|| Hermenegildo Elices |- |FW ||8|| José Luis Panizo |- |FW ||9|| Telmo Zarra |- |FW||10|| Isidoro Urra |- |FW||11|| Agustín Gaínza |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Juan Urquizu |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|Real Madrid CF: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| Gonzalo Marzá |- |DF ||2|| José María Querejeta |- |DF ||3|| José Corona |- |MF ||4|| José Ramón Sauto |- |MF ||5|| Juan Antonio Ipiña (c) |- |MF ||6|| Moleiro |- |FW ||7|| Antonio Alsúa |- |FW ||8|| Chus Alonso |- |FW ||9|| Pruden |- |FW||10|| Sabino Barinaga |- |FW||11|| Pascual Botella |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Ramón Encinas |- |} |} ==See also== *El Viejo Clásico ==References== 1943 Copa Category:Athletic Bilbao matches Category:Real Madrid CF matches
title: 1943 Copa del Generalísimo Final
